summary: This module implements a Checkov Terraform rule that validates the release channel setting of Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster resources. It defines a lightweight data holder for the allowed channel values and a check class derived from the generic resource‑value checker, which inspects the relevant Terraform attribute and flags configurations that do not use an approved release channel.
business_intent: Ensure GKE clusters are configured with a supported release channel to maintain up‑to‑date, secure, and compliant Kubernetes versions, thereby reducing the risk of running clusters on outdated or unsupported releases.
